name: Cellular-IDS
short_description:
The source code LMG Security used to turn a Samsung-Verizon Network Extender into a Cellular Intrusion Detection System for less than $300. The project was demonstrated at Blackhat 2013 and DEFCON 21.
The CIDS project can provide direct access to cellular traffic, allowing for analysis of mobile malware behavior in ways never before possible. For more information, see our blog post and whitepaper at http://lmgsecurity.com/blog/2013/07/26/diy-cellula .
summary: Cellular IDS based on Samsung's Network Extender
